Interrupts.Name: Mutate
Interrupts.Effects: The Pariah gains vigor 1 before damage is applied.

Actions.Name: Flesh warp
Actions.Description: The Pariah rips itself apart, then reassembles. It teleports 2, then teleports 2. It can split up these teleports with another action.

Actions.Name: Chaos Beam
Actions.Effects: Roll 1d6 and apply the following effects to all characters within. Effects, except vigor and statuses, last until the end of the round.

Rolls.Description: Characters may teleport when they move.
All characters grant cover to other characters until the end of next round.
Characters that end their turn adjacent to at least one other character take 25% of their max hp as damage per adjacent character, then grants vigor 1 to each adjacent character.
Characters are removed from the battlefield, then returned to play at the start of their next turn.
Characters are reduced to 50% max hp if above 50% max hp. Characters below 50% max hp gain vigor 2.

Actions.Name: Chaos Storm
Actions.Description: Remove all characters in the area from the battlefield, then place them in any space within range 3 of their original location.
